p: Chemical constituents of the EOs under investigation were characterized by Automated Mass spectral Deconvolution and Identification (AMDIS) software, version 2.71 (Gaithersburg, MD, USA) ( www.amdis.net), retention indices (relative to n-alkanes C 8â€“C 22), and comparison of the mass spectrum with authentic compounds (if available) from the Wiley spectral library collection and NIST library database (Gaithersburg, MD, USA; Wiley, Hoboken, NJ, USA).
